thread.title_full: Beaten until they collapse for sex outside of marriage | Daily Mail Online

author: Gareth Davies For Mailonline
title: Beaten until they collapse for sex outside of marriage | Daily Mail Online
text: Beaten until they collapse for the crime of having sex outside of marriage: Man and woman are caned in Indonesia after violating strict Sharia law The barbaric caning was handed down by Islamic legislators who regulate and enforce the strict Islamic law Laws state that a man and woman are banned from any sexual contact unless they are a married couple The beatings occurred in Aceh, which is the only province in the country which implements Sharia law in full People are also flogged for a range of offences including forms of gambling, drinking alcohol and gay sex Published: 08:42 GMT, 27 February 2017 | Updated: 08:55 GMT, 27 February 2017 12 shares
